item.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Migration on Cluster002
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 17, 21:00 - 21:30 UTC

Aug 17, 12:58 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 17/08/2022 21:00 UTC
End time : 17/08/2022 21:30 UTC
Service impact : During this operation, Some customers may experience an unavailability for access to databases from phpmyadmin.
No impact on access to client sites, databases directly.

item.title: [GRA1/GRA3][Web Hosting] - CloudDB migrations
item.description:
Aug 16, 14:44 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 16, 14:15 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 16/08/2022 14:00 UTC
End time : 18/08/2022 00:00 UTC
Service impact :
During this operation, our customers may experience an unavailability of 1 minute
Service improvement :
Within the framework of the continuous improvement of our services, we carry out an operation of migration of the DBMS instances from GRA1 to GRA3. The concerned clusters by this maintenance are: sql008 (GRA1). Containers will migrate to eu010 (GRA3).
Please note that the current maintenance can take place 24/24.
